content.rendered:
SNAP TECH IT EVENTS

UPCOMING EVENTS

Monthly Education Webinar for November: Life Hack my Microsoft 365

Register now to gain efficiency and productivity across Microsoft 365.

Date: Thursday November 21st at 2:00 PM EST
Register

Microsoft 365 has countless features available to boost your productivity and collaboration within your organization. While you may be familiar with Microsoft apps, you may be missing some key efficiency hacks.

Don’t miss this opportunity to supercharge your productivity and efficiency in M365.

We will be sharing:

  • Microsoft Teams tips and tricks, especially for sales and collaboration
  • File-based collaboration with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files
  • The hidden gems and free apps in the Microsoft 365 bundle
  • Plus, the BIG question… What is Copilot and how can it help me?

About our presenters:
Shawn Brown (President) and Ted Hulsy (CRO) each have over twenty years of experience helping businesses maximize their technology. The Snap Tech IT team works with dozens of clients every day to help them take their software investments to another level. They will each bring their favorite Microsoft 365 life hack to the table to show you how to start doing more.

IN-PERSON EVENTS

SOLD OUT! - Kennesaw, GA

DATE: Tuesday, October 22nd  VENUE: Ruth’s Chris Steakhouse

SOLD OUT! - Peoria, AZ

DATE: Tuesday, October 29th  VENUE: Fleming’s Steakhouse

FINAL EVENT: Walnut Creek, CA

Register

DATE: Tuesday, November 12th TIME: 12-1:30pm

VENUE: Ruth’s Chris Steakhouse, 1553 Olympic Blvd Bldg. E, Walnut Creek, CA 94596

Microsoft Copilot Lunch & Learn

Microsoft Copilot is a cutting-edge AI tool with the promise to revolutionize the way teams collaborate and create within Microsoft applications.

While many people have heard of Microsoft Copilot, few have started to use it to propel their business forward. It’s time to wipe away the confusion! Join us for an in-person Lunch and Learn to clear up any confusion about what Microsoft Copilot can and can’t do for your business.

Join us for lunch and learn about the strengths and weaknesses of Microsoft Copilot’s capabilities for the following applications:

  • One Note
  • Teams
  • Outlook
  • Word
  • PowerPoint
  • Excel
  • And more!

 

Don’t miss this opportunity for a guided exploration of what Copilot can do to amp up your productivity!

ON-DEMAND EVENTS

Explore our events and enrich your mind

  • On-Demand-Webinars

How to use Automation in your Business to Save Time and Money

Have you ever wished you could remove mundane, repetitive technology or data-related tasks in your business? Watch this On-Demand  webinar to explore the latest advancements in automation technology. Understand how early adopters are finding success in automating workflows across multiple software and data  systems to save time and money while increasing productivity and job satisfaction.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

How to Master AI Image Creation to Unlock Powerful Storytelling and Business Productivity

As Artificial Intelligence keeps reshaping the business landscape, AI image-creation tools are attracting a lot of attention. Some of that attention has been on entertaining our co-workers with our latest AI headshots. And yes, while you do look great in the Oval Office wearing an ascot and holding a scepter, there are some more practical and professional uses for AI image creation that we are going to discuss in this webinar. How can your business leverage AI image-creation tools to enhance storytelling and productivity?
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Top 3 Ways ChatGPT Could be Saving Your Business Time and Money and How to Master Them

When generating content through ChatGPT, many business owners, HR directors, operations directors, and even sales and marketing execs have found the output of ChatGPT a little less than…shall we say, human?
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

How To Create a Vision with the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS)

In Part 2 of this two-part series, How To Create a Vision with the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS), Certified EOS Implementer, Brian Sulka and Shawn Brown, President and Co-Founder of an experienced EOS-run business, SnapTech IT, will teach you how to create a vision that will guide every person in your organization to contribute to your business success.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

How To Gain Traction with the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS)

In Part 1 of this two-part series, How To Gain Traction with the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS), Certified EOS Implementer, Brian Sulka and Shawn Brown, President and Co-Founder of an experienced EOS-run business, SnapTech IT, will introduce the importance of creating traction in each area of your business and the essential components you need to reshape the way you run your business for success.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Snap Tech IT’s 2024 Outlook

Join us we look forward to the new year in “Snap Tech IT’s 2024 IT Outlook.” The IT landscape is poised for critical changes, impacting businesses of all sizes and across industries. This webinar is your opportunity to gain valuable insights into the technology trends and strategies that will shape the IT landscape in the coming year.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Ask a Hacker How New AI Tools are Making Hackers Even More Dangerous

In today's digital landscape, the evolution of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) technologies has not only revolutionized businesses but has also empowered cybercriminals with advanced tools and techniques. Join us for an intriguing webinar, "Ask a Hacker," where we delve into the fascinating world of AI-driven hacking and discuss how these emerging technologies are enabling cybercriminals to become even more dangerous.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Seven Ways to Manage Your Outsourced IT Service Provider

Outsourcing IT services is cost-effective, provides access to specialized expertise, and the flexibility for a rapidly changing technology landscape. However, effective management of your outsourced IT service provider is crucial to ensure that you get the most value out of the partnership.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

New SEC Cybersecurity Requirements for Investment Advisers in 2023

This webinar aims to provide investment advisers with a comprehensive understanding of the new SEC cybersecurity requirements introduced in 2023. By attending this session, participants will gain valuable insights into the regulatory landscape and learn how to effectively navigate the evolving cybersecurity landscape to safeguard their clients' data and reputations.
See More
  • Educational Assets

Seven Key Steps to Securing Remote Workers

In today's rapidly evolving work environment, remote work has become crucial for many organizations. However, with this increased flexibility comes a heightened need for robust security measures to protect sensitive data and mitigate potential cyber risks. Join us for an insightful webinar as we explore the seven key steps to securing remote workers effectively. In this webinar, we will explore: How to assess remote work risks, Why identity and access management (IAM) is one of the most important cybersecurity considerations and so much more.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

CMMC Back to Basics: 7 Tips for Manufacturing Leaders

As the manufacturing industry becomes increasingly interconnected and dependent on digital systems, cybersecurity has become a critical concern. The Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) framework has emerged as a vital requirement for defense contractors. In this webinar, we will explore the fundamental principles of CMMC and provide manufacturing leaders with seven essential tips to enhance their cybersecurity posture and achieve compliance.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Migrating Your File Server to the Cloud

With the rise of mobility and remote work, users need to share files from anywhere and from any kind of device. However, many companies have yet to modernize their file server and migrate their files to the cloud. During this webinar, the experts at Snap Tech IT will explore the benefits of a cloud-file sharing approach. With cloud-file sharing, collaboration becomes convenient, mobile-friendly, and secure.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

How Small Businesses Can Leverage ChatGPT for Business Growth

Accelerate Small Business Success with ChatGPT - Join our webinar to explore how AI-powered ChatGPT streamlines operations, boosts productivity, and outperforms competitors. Learn benefits, use cases, and integration tips for customer service, sales, and marketing.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Cyber Liability 101

Risk management is about covering all your bases, including the right cyber liability insurance. But you probably have more questions than answers on the topic. That’s why we have secured one of the industry’s foremost experts for this webinar. Hear noted author and speaker, Joseph Brunsman, as he explores the top questions business leaders should ask when securing cyber liability insurance.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Life Hack My Microsoft 365

Microsoft 365 is the gold standard for communications and collaboration. Too often however, lots of cool features and functions in the Microsoft platform go un-used. You may be using Microsoft Teams for chat and video conferencing, but are you using it to sell more and grow your revenues? Has your company modernized your file collaboration techniques? Are you leveraging the full Microsoft suite?
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

How I Would Hack You: Confessions of an Ethical Hacker

In this short webinar, ethical hacker and professional pen-tester, James Carroll, will reveal the most common weaknesses in most small businesses and how he would exploit them. He will also discuss why so many small businesses are frequent cyber security victims and what you can do about it.
See More
  • Case Study

Client Case Study: Modern & Secure Cloud File Sharing

Businesses thrive in a collaborative environment that enables team members to easily share, store & secure information to perform their jobs. With many cloud sharing tools, users battle a number of challenges when it comes to file access, simplified sharing & effectively securing files with the appropriate level of backup.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Microsoft Teams: Top Security Tips to Boost Productivity

Remote working and COVID-19 have vastly accelerated the use of Microsoft Teams over the last two years; a real game-changer for remote teams. MS Teams does have a number of security vulnerabilities that businesses need to understand and address. Join us for a practical conversation on how to strengthen your remote work environment to protect all parties involved.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

CMMC Client Case Study: Compliance Preparation Process

Join us to see firsthand how Nate Ankrom, President of Genuine Machine Products, is following a structured compliance preparation process to achieve certification goals. Gain the insights you need to create your roadmap to maintaining compliance for existing & future contracts.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Securing Remote Work Environments in Legal Firms

Law firms are realizing that client interaction through legal service delivery must be evaluated on several fronts. From critical access & transmission of sensitive information to securing the IT environment as whole, strategic & tactical planning is a must when you’re entrusted to protect your clients & your business. Join us for a practical conversation on how to strengthen your remote work environment to protect all parties involved.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Navigating Cyber Insurance

Watch as Shawn Brown, Snap Tech IT COO, sits down with Wes Spencer of FifthWall Solutions & Justin Reinmuth of techrug to discuss how to lower insurance premiums with a few security controls • How to lower insurance premiums with a few security controls • What is covered in a cyber insurance policy • One size doesn’t fit all – how cyber insurance policies are different • Eligibility requirements for cyber insurance
See More
  • Educational Assets

CMMC Updates: Pushing Forward to May 2023 Interim Rule

DoD CIO is leading the charge & this realignment is chartered with consolidating industry-related cybersecurity programs in an effort to maximize collaboration across the Defense Industrial Base Cybersecurity programs. DoD CIO is pushing forward, requesting an interim rule by May 2023.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Real-World Cybersecurity: Process-Driven Managed Detection & Response

Join Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT and Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT, as they walk you through a real-world scenario where the source of the attack was identified, lateral movement through the environment was halted, & the steps taken to neutralize the threat.
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Tightening Cybersecurity Posture with a Secret Weapon

Join cybersecurity experts, Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT, & Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT for a 30-minute conversation on Strengthening Data Security & Compliance for Legal Firms
See More
  • On-Demand-Webinars

Russian Cyber Attacks on DOD & DIB

Join cybersecurity experts, Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT, & Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT for a 30-minute conversation on Strengthening Data Security & Compliance for Legal Firms
See More
  • Educational Assets

Webinar: Strengthening Data Security for Legal Firms

Join cybersecurity experts, Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT, & Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT for a 30-minute conversation on Strengthening Data Security & Compliance for Legal Firms
See More
  • Podcasts & Videos

The Value of a Risk Assessment

Risk assessments are a snapshot in time, providing insights into the health of your security & are an effective tool in capturing vulnerabilities that require attention.
See More
  • Podcasts & Videos

Application Control Podcast

Application Control Podcast Application Control is an important part of a good thought-out CyberDefense strategy. Yet, it’s something many companies are missing from the defense…
See More

Ready to get the IT help you need? Let's talk

Contact Us
